Query:
SELECT
				     sctl.ID,
					 sctl.SourceMDN,
					 tt.TransactionName,
					 et1.EnumValue,
					 DATE_FORMAT(sctl.CreateTime, ${DateTimeFormat}),
					 DATE_FORMAT(sctl.LastUpdateTime, ${DateTimeFormat})
				FROM
				     enum_text et1,
					 service_charge_txn_log sctl INNER JOIN transaction_type tt ON tt.ID= sctl.TransactionTypeID
				WHERE
					 sctl.TransactionTypeID IN (select ID from transaction_type where transaction_type.TransactionName in 
																('ChangePIN', 'CheckBalance', 'History', 'ChangeSettings',
																'RegistrationWithActivation', 'ChangeEmail', 'ChangeNickname', 
																'ForgotPin', 'NFCCardUnlink', 'NFCPocketBalance', 'NFCCardLink',
																'AddFavorite', 'EditFavorite', 'DeleteFavorite', 'NFCCardBalance', 
																'KYCUpgrade', 'ModifyNFCCardAlias', 'EmailHistoryAsPDF', 
																'DownloadHistoryAsPDF', 'RegistrationWithActivationForHub', 
																'GenerateOTP', 'ValidateOTP', 'KYCUpgradeEnquiry', 'GenerateFavoriteJSON'))
					 AND et1.TagID=6089 AND sctl.status=et1.EnumCode
					 AND sctl.CreateTime >= ${StartTime}
					 AND sctl.CreateTime < ${EndTime}
					 AND sctl.status like ${TransactionStatus} 
					 AND sctl.TransactionTypeID like ${TransactionType}
					 AND sctl.SourceMDN like ${SourceMDN} 
				ORDER BY
				     sctl.CreateTime ASC
